english.segment1: You could never put it. On a map once you're in. There's no turning back. We work together or we. Don't work at all nothin. You can do will make us fall. Pokinatch! punx!. He's meaningful to us but. Not to you he's the one. True center of our lives. His light is shining thro-. Ugh and on to you it's. Your choice he'll always. Be there waiting. Pokinatch! punx!
